metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7836 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in the LTImodule in Moodle through 2.4.11, 2.5.x before 2.5.9, 2.6.x before 2.6.6,and 2.7.x before 2.7.3 allow remote attackers to hijack the authenticationof arbitrary users for a (1) mod/lti/request_tool.php or (2)mod/lti/instructor_edit_tool_type.php request.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
